keyMoments.title: Full Crew Reunites at Gyoncorde Plaza
keyMoments.description: The entire Straw Hat crew assembles together at Gyoncorde Plaza for the first time since arriving at Fish-Man Island. The Thousand Sunny arrives carrying the crew members who execute Jinbe's coordinated rescue plan.
keyMoments.significance: This marks the first time the complete crew is together on Fish-Man Island and demonstrates their coordinated teamwork in the rescue operation.

keyMoments.title: Luffy Poses the Friend or Foe Question
keyMoments.description: With his crew assembled, Luffy asks the citizens of Fish-Man Island to decide whether the Straw Hats are friends or enemies to the island.
keyMoments.significance: Shows the crew's respect for the autonomy of the Fish-Man Island citizens and addresses the theme of choosing one's allies freely.

keyMoments.title: Captain Hody Exposed as Queen Otohime's Killer
keyMoments.description: The crew's captain, Hody Jones, is publicly exposed as the one who assassinated Queen Otohime and framed a human pirate for the crime.
keyMoments.significance: This revelation undermines the ideological foundation of Hody's crew, which was built on hatred of humans supposedly justified by a human killing their queen.

keyMoments.title: Attacked by the Thousand Sunny's Gaon Cannon
keyMoments.description: The New Fish-Man Pirates' forces are attacked when the Thousand Sunny fires its Gaon Cannon at them during the rescue operation.
keyMoments.significance: Marks the beginning of the final battle between the New Fish-Man Pirates and the Straw Hats.
